sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Shield, TrendingUp, Users, Award, Briefcase, Target, HandshakeIcon, Coins, ArrowRight, Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Instagram } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = ({ user }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const handleBecomeAgent = async () => { try { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (!token) { toast.error('Please login first'); navigate('/login'); return; } const response = await axios.post( 'http://localhost:5000/auth/become-agent', {}, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` } } ); if (response.data.success) { setShowModal(true); localStorage.removeItem('token'); setTimeout(() => { setShowModal(false); navigate('/login'); }, 3000); } } catch (error) { toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to become an agent'); } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Invest in Your Future

Discover a world of mutual funds tailored to your financial goals. Let us help you build a prosperous future through smart, diversified investments.

Get Started Learn More
{/* Why Choose Us Section */}

Why Choose Us

Secure Investment

Your investments are protected by robust security measures and backed by industry-leading safeguards.

High Returns

Consistently high returns on your investments through carefully selected and managed portfolios.

Expert Team

Our team of experienced financial experts is dedicated to helping you achieve your investment goals.

Award Winning

Recognized for excellence in financial services and customer satisfaction across the industry.

{/* Only show Join Us section if user is not an agent */} {(!user || user.role !== 'agent') && (

Join Our Team

Flexible Work

Work on your own schedule and from anywhere

High Commission

Earn attractive commissions on every successful referral

Growth Opportunity

Unlimited earning potential with performance bonuses

)} {/* Success Modal */} {showModal && (

Welcome to the Team!

You are now a registered agent. Please log in again to access your dashboard.

)} {/* Footer Section */}

Quick Links

  • About Us
  • Contact
  • Privacy Policy

Follow Us

© 2024 Budget Brilliance. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Home;
